short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for only Sarkar Communication related tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sarkar Communication, situated at Bowbazar, Krishnagar, Nadia(W.B.), India, is a mobile phone repairing Service Center which has authorization of repairing numerous mobile phones such as Lava, Intex, Itel, Panasonic, Infinix, Tecno, Salora, Ivoomi, Lemon, Swipe etc.
